lead_paragraph: Utah Jazz guard Derek Fisher was released from his contract to care for his 10-month-old daughter, who has cancer. Fisher and his wife, Candace, said they needed time to search for the best treatment for their daughter, Tatum. Fisher at times fought exhaustion trying to balance basketball and his daughter’s care. Once, in May, he spent a day at a New York hospital, then flew back to Utah for a Western Conference semifinal game against the Golden State Warriors.
